post:
[VPS Soldiers](https://www.vpssoldiers.net) aims to please, we have many plans to choose from for whatever your needs may be. All of our servers are configured in RAID 10 and have over 64GB RAM, and at least a 1Gbps connection. If you need something special feel free to contact us to see if we can provide you with what you need. VPS Soldiers is operated under VPS Solutions, LLC in the state of Kansas.

All plans have dedicated RAM and storage, CPU is shared.

Check out our North Carolina [Looking Glass](https://www.vpssoldiers.net/network/nc)

-----

**KVM 512 MB**

- 512 MB RAM

- 1 Core

- 20 GB Disk Space

- 1 IPv4 Address

- IPv6 Subnet (/64)

- 1 TB Bandwidth

- $3.50/mo

[Order Now](https://my.vpssoldiers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

-----

**KVM 1 GB**

- 1 GB RAM

- 1 Core

- 30 GB Disk Space

- 1 IPv4 Address

- IPv6 Subnet (/64)

- 2 TB Bandwidth

- $5.00/mo

[Order Now](https://my.vpssoldiers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

-----

**KVM 2 GB**

- 2 GB RAM

- 1 Core

- 40 GB Disk Space

- 1 IPv4 Address

- IPv6 Subnet (/64)

- 3 TB Bandwidth

- $10.00/mo (using coupon "LET7" will drop the price to $7/mo)

[Order Now](https://my.vpssoldiers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=let7)
